In a message dated 9/11/2003 4:08:31 PM Central Daylight Time,

Milt,
The guard looks a lot better now.  I'm not sure about the arm, but it looks 
like there's a cloud missing from the back in the lower left quadrant.  That is 
an unusual rim.

Jim
Jim und all,
Yes, a big cloud is definitely missing on the flip side, 7 O'clock area.
If you klick on the detail of dragon pic..........the full size pic will show 
you why I suspect the left forearm is missing.  The carving of the dragon 
seems to be " depressed"  there, not consistent with the rest of the scales.
There are definitely traces of lacquer at the rim, I managed to preserved 
that.
Also near the kogai hitsu-ana, you can see three " lines " of remaining 
lacquer.

Milt
